meta_description: Aleksei Sotskov's Product Management Portfolio web-site
pitch: Product Manager with engineering & entrepreneurship backgrounds and passion for solving real problems for the customers and businesses

About.section_data: Builder at heart, ex Product Software Engineer and currently a Product Manager who makes products with deep and lasting feeling of exceptional care. I fall in love with the problems, not solutions, and build products the way that customers love yet that works for the business. Currently I am looking for a Product Manager job in an Empowered Product Team working in a Product Operating Model primarily in Northern Europe.

Projects.section_explanatory_text: I solve problems for businesses and learn by making contract work and side-projects. Check out descriptions, screenshots, GIFs, videos and direct links for each of 10+ of my products:

section_data.description: Encouraged Product Managers and Engineers to better sell themselves in resumes and interviews by building a GitHub-based portfolio template — so they could fork it, adjust data.json file with their data and get personal, nice-looking, responsive portfolio web-site hosted by GitHub Pages for free.

Added value and improved UX for already existing and selling on Amazon and Etsy “Life Calendar” product by adding data from World Health Organization and Human Mortality Database. Currently work with 2 interior designers to make a data-art picture to decorate walls in apartments.

Saved an entrepreneur in Montenegro hours of time every day by applying a chat-bot that automatically process thousands of daily messages in different Telegram chats and increased sales by 15%+ by contacting prospects faster than competitors using chat-bot.

Developed a high fidelity real data prototype for features usage product analytics service that helps software development teams to make data-informed UX decisions and eliminate feature bloat for digital apps and services.

x2 increased sales for a cleaning services entrepreneur in Russia by building and selling a Telegram bot that automatically parses, filters and detects only wanted procurement orders faster than competitors.

section_data.header: ”SQA Mate”, 2015-2019, B2B SaaS, SD tools (side-project at RingCentral)
section_data.description: Dropped by 80% efforts of QA Engineers at RingCentral on manual test cases management by development of test cases management system with advanced and user centered User eXperience.
Empowered hundreds of QA Engineers in the world to apply pairwise testing for test cases generation faster and easily by creating a simple web UI for an existing pairwise tests library.

section_data.header: ”Aport”, 2017, B2B SaaS, SD tools (side-project at RingCentral)
section_data.description: By 2024 saved the company 3+ man-years on logs collection only by crafting a web service that enables efficient logs collection and sharing across tens of servers in tens of environments at the company.

Interviews.title: “Interview with Aleksei Sotskov before QA-Meetup in Nizhny Novgorod”

Books.description: Wrote a book (in Russian) to guide people who think about to transit in their careers to IT with independent from online courses marketing information — so they could know what they can and shoud expect and what are the myths.
